original_text: When the Most High divided to the nations their inheritance, when he separated the sons of Adam, he set the bounds of the people according to the number of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 지극히 높으신 자가 민족들에게 기업을 주실 때에, 인종을 나누실 때에 이스라엘 자손의 수효대로 백성들의 경계를 정하셨도다

sentences.original_text: When the Most High divided to the nations their inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 지존께서 민족들에게 그들의 유업을 나누어 주실 때

sentences.original_text: when he separated the sons of Adam
he set the bounds of the people
according to the number of the children of Israel
